Interface SmeupDataLayoutSection

Represent a section of the layout of the fields in a form

interface SmeupDataLayoutSection {
    content?: SmeupDataLayoutField[];
    dim?: string;
    gap?: number;
    gridCols?: number;
    gridRows?: number;
    horizontal?: boolean;
    id?: string;
    sections?: SmeupDataLayoutSection[];
}
